name: Alaska Float Ratings
about: Alaska Float Ratings, located in Moose Pass on the Kenai Peninsula, offers unparalleled float plane training since 1975. Our courses, including the Float Rating, Mountain Flying, and Bush Pilots programs, are conducted in the majestic Alaskan wilderness, providing an immersive learning experience. Students fly Super Cub float planes, mastering skills in tight mountain passes and remote lakes. Our expert instructors, with generations of experience, ensure a thorough, professional, and safety-conscious education. The school includes lodging options and various course packages to suit different needs, making it an ideal destination for pilots seeking advanced float plane training in one of the world's most beautiful and challenging environments. Alaska Float Ratings is committed to delivering a rewarding and life-changing flying experience.
